item.description:
We'll start by making 2 types of seitan from scratch using the boiling method and the baking method. Then we'll use the seitan in two different stir-fry dishes (a mild one and a hot one). We will provide the seitan, local organic veggies, and brown rice - we ask that you bring a beverage, dessert, or appetizer. We'll have some organic bulk wheat gluten available for purchase.

Cooking: 4-5:30/6pm
Eating: 6-8pm
General socializing: 8pm - ?
item.name: Seitan Party!
